mapper.select: SELECT s.*, d.department_name FROM Student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.department_no = d.no
mapper.insert: INSERT Student (id, name, department_no, student_email, student_phone, password1, password2, userType) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{department_no}, #{student_email}, #{student_phone}, #{password1}, #{password2}, '학생')
mapper.update: UPDATE Student SET id = #{id}, name = #{name}, department_no = #{department_no}, student_email = #{student_email}, student_phone = #{student_phone}, password1 = #{password1}, password2 = #{password2} WHERE student_no = #{student_no}
